summary: The module defines a class that aggregates utility operations for managing body load data in finite‑element models within ANSYS MAPDL. It supports creating, scaling, accumulating, deleting, listing, uniformly distributing, reading from files, and importing body load definitions.
business_intent: To provide a programmatic interface that automates the setup, modification, and import/export of body loads in ANSYS MAPDL simulations, streamlining finite‑element analysis workflows.
